snippet: A senior North Korean diplomat said Wednesday that his country was willing to have “any kind of talks” to ease tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
abstract: Senior North Korean diplomat says his country is willing to negotiate to ease tensions on Korean Peninsula, while simultaneously repeating call for United States to dismantle its military command in South Korea.
lead_paragraph: A senior North Korean diplomat said Wednesday that his country was willing to have “any kind of talks” to ease tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

headline.main: North Korea Repeats Call for Talks
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Repeat Call for Talks
